entries.start_fishing: You cast your line and start fishing...
entries.stop_fishing: You reel-in your line and stop fishing...
entries.bad_cast: Your cast goes astray and lands at a non-fishable spot.
entries.toss_bait: You toss aside your used bait.
entries.fs_snag: Your line gets snagged on some vegetation...
entries.line_free: Your line comes free of its snag...
entries.hard_nibble: There is a strong, sharp tug at the end of your line...
entries.hard_bite: Your pole flexes hard as your line goes taut...
entries.lost_catch: Your line falls limp... whatever you had caught... it got away...
entries.line_spooled: Your catch ran so hard that it pulled your line right out of the pole...
entries.fish_fight_easy: Your catch fights your efforts with a noble attempt, but is losing...
entries.fish_fight_hard: Your catch takes a bit more slack from your line...
entries.fish_fight_away: Your catch moves away taking a bit more line...
entries.fish_fight_closer: You succeed in drawing your catch closer...
entries.fish_run: Your catch tries making a run for it...
entries.fish_charge: Your catch charges toward your location...
entries.loot_beached: You drag your catch from the water-line...
entries.must_have_pole: To fish, you must first have a fishing pole equipped.
entries.bait_your_pole: To fish, you must first bait your pole.
entries.cast_line: You cast your line and begin fishing...
entries.out_of_bait: You have run out of bait in your tackle...
entries.too_far: You must be within 2 meters of fishable water and facing it to start fishing.
entries.invalid_location: Unable to determine valid fishing location ahead of you.
entries.inventory_full: Since your inventory is full, you toss the fish back...
entries.size_matters: The fish was too small, so you toss it back...
entries.already_fileted: But this fish has already been filleted.
entries.units_inventory: You require %DI units of available space in your inventory to filet this fish.
entries.no_resource: There was no salvageable resource to harvest.
entries.shucks_veggies: Shucks... It was really just a handful of vegetation.
entries.toss_trash: Since your inventory is full, you toss the trash back in the water...
entries.bait_only: A fishing tackle can only accept bait-type items.
entries.cannot_remove_bait: You cannot remove bait that is currently in use...
entries.close_reel_in: Since your line is so close, you reel it in...
entries.strong_nibble: A strong nibble leaves you without a baited line...
entries.tore_bait: Something just tore the bait right off the end of your line...
entries.not_this_vehicle: You cannot fish while riding on this vehicle or mount.
entries.far_reel_in: You have traveled too far from your casting location, you reel in your line...
